text: Jerome Opoku (born 14 October 1998) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for Plymouth Argyle on loan from Fulham. == Club career == ===Fulham=== He captained the Fulham U23's at the end of the 2018-19 season. On 2 September 2019, Opoku was sent on loan to League One side Accrington Stanley in order to gain first team experience. He made his Accrington debut against Bristol Rovers on 7 September 2019 in an eventual 3–3 draw. After a 3–1 defeat to Sunderland, in an interview he claimed he would play anywhere the coach put him. On 25 September 2020, Opoku joined League One side Plymouth Argyle on loan until January. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Accrington Stanley F.C. players Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football defenders
title: Jerome Opoku
